doc:
Hawthorne James https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hawthorne_James 0 Hawthorne James is an American actor and director, known for his role as Big Red Davis in the 1991 film The Five Heartbeats.He is also known for his role as Sam, the injured bus driver, in Speed and for films and television series such as Seven, NYPD Blue and guest-starring on Frasier as Bill in the season one episode "Miracle on Third or Fourth Street". He was born James Hawthorne in Chicago, Illinois, the son of Robert Hawthorne and A. M. Alene. Hawthorne_James is an_American_actor_and_director , known for his_role as Big_Red_Davis in the_1991_film The_Five_Heartbeats.He is_also_known for his_role as Sam , the_injured_bus_driver , in Speed and for films and television_series such_as Seven , NYPD_Blue and guest-starring on Frasier as Bill in the_season_one_episode " Miracle on Third or Fourth_Street_" . He was_born James_Hawthorne in Chicago , Illinois , the_son of Robert_Hawthorne and A._M._Alene .
